snippet: The superlative performance of Boston College goalie Parker Milner, who made 27 saves, helped the top-seeded Eagles fend off Ferris State for the Frozen Four title.
abstract: Boston College defeats Ferris State, 4-1, to win the NCAA ice hockey national championship.
lead_paragraph: The superlative performance of Boston College goalie Parker Milner, who made 27 saves, helped the top-seeded Eagles fend off Ferris State for the Frozen Four title.

headline.seo: Boston College Beats Ferris State to Win Hockey Title
headline.main: Boston College Wins 5th Title, but Underdog Puts Up a Fight
headline.print_headline: Boston College Wins 5th Title, But Underdog Puts Up a Fight
headline.content_kicker: N.C.A.A. Hockey Championship: Boston College 4, Ferris State 1
headline.kicker: N.C.A.A. Hockey Championship: Boston College 4, Ferris State 1
